title: Introduction to React Hooks
body: Learn the fundamentals of React Hooks and how to use them to simplify your code. Hooks allow you to use state and other React features without writing a class.
content: In this article we will explore React Hooks and how they can improve your development.

title: JavaScript Performance Optimization
body: Advanced techniques to improve the performance of your JavaScript applications. From lazy loading to code splitting, discover best practices.
content: Optimize your JavaScript code with these professional techniques.

title: Complete TypeScript Guide
body: TypeScript has become the standard for frontend development. Learn from scratch to advanced concepts in this complete guide.

title: Docker for Developers
body: Learn to containerize your applications with Docker. From basic concepts to production deployments, everything you need to know.

title: Microservices with Node.js
body: Microservices architecture using Node.js. Learn to design, develop and deploy scalable and maintainable microservices.

title: GraphQL vs REST API
body: Detailed comparison between GraphQL and REST API. Discover when to use each and the advantages of each approach for your projects.
content: Choose the best API for your project.

title: Testing in React with Jest and Testing Library
body: Learn to write effective tests for your React components. We'll cover unit tests, integration tests and best practices.

title: CI/CD with GitHub Actions
body: Automate your development pipeline with GitHub Actions. From automatic tests to continuous deployments, configure your complete CI/CD.

title: Web Application Security
body: Security best practices for modern web applications. Protect your application against common vulnerabilities and attacks.
content: Protect your web application with these techniques.

title: Hexagonal Architecture in Python
body: Implement hexagonal architecture (ports and adapters) in Python. Separate business logic from implementation details.
content: Design more maintainable applications with hexagonal architecture.

title: Machine Learning for Developers
body: Practical introduction to machine learning for developers. Learn to integrate ML models into your applications.
